channel.title: Looking to Create a New Breed of RSPS
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape members, I am looking for a few people to get this off and running. I am hoping to create a new 317 server. I will handle the forums and community as far as being sure that the reports are dealt with and all password inquiries are fulfilled.
[b]About Me[/b] [u]Name:[/u] Nathan [u]Age:[/u] 17 [u]Position:[/u] Webmaster/Community Manager [u]Email/MSN:[/u] natewentworth@hotmail.com [u]Time Zone:[/u] GMT -5 [EST]
If you are interested in joining the team, I will need the following jobs to be filled; [b]Developer/Programmer - Must be fairly well-trained (1/2)[/b]
[b]Applications (Copy & Paste)[/b]
[code][b]Developer/Programmer[/b] [u]Name:[/u] [u]Age:[/u] [u]Email/MSN:[/u] [u]Recent Work:[/u] [u]How well can you code? (1/10):[/u] [u]How long have you been coding?:[/u][/code]
If you'd like to create the best RSPS out there, be sure to apply. I am only looking for experienced people to join the team. Please only post if you would consider yourself experienced.
The server source will be decided among the future staff.
Thank you for your time, Nathan

rune-place has applied for every development I have seen.

item.title: Looking to Create a New Breed of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Pull_Ups Pull Ups
item.description:
@Pull_Ups wrote:

I want to create something completely new. Custom Home, some items, a Bank PIN system, and some other cool ideas I had in mind. I’d obviously try to do that with the forums and find an experienced developer/programmer for the other things ingame.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking to Create a New Breed of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

siden:

Gl and 614 are pretty hard O.o

317 to 614 - all of them are based on Java, so nothing is hard IMO.

Good luck on this bro. What do you mean by “New Breed of RSPS”. The topic interested me, but the content of the thread didn’t give me any idea of what you’re planning to do.

Read full topic

Hello MoparScape members, I am looking for a few people to get this off and running. I am hoping to create a new 317 server. I will handle the forums and community as far as being sure that the reports are dealt with and all password inquiries are fulfilled.

About Me
Name: Nathan
Age: 17
Position: Webmaster/Community Manager
Email/MSN: natewentworth@hotmail.com
